title: B5 Trolls infested in OCE Ranked [OUT OF CONTROL]

embed.description: This is the perfect example of why we need a tribunal. Need I say more?

body:
[Video explains itself. Be sure to view it in 1080p]

Riot, how long until you moderate this? This is got to be the worst of the worst of Elo Hell.

Played Ranked around 02-19-2014 at 8:00 AM EST. 12:00 AEST

replies.body:
"8:00 AM"

Try a time where more sane people are playing?

Anyway, posting of your youtube videos is not for this board. To self-advertise, go to Misc. Then you'll probably get a red telling you the same thing.

>complaining about being matched with trolls and also saying that elo hell is full of them

Just think about that with a clear head for a bit.

Last thing, name-calling is forbidden on the boards in general. Remove that link to the youtube video, or at least censor their summoner names.
